認定調査票_サービスの状況

select.id: get認定調査票サービス状況

mapper.select: SELECT DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo."remban" AS 認定調査票_連番 ,DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo."serviceJokyo" AS 認定調査票_サービスの状況 FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo" AS DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo ON DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo."shinseishoKanriNo"=DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" AND DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo."ninteichosaRirekiNo"=(SELECT MAX(DbT5207Nintei."ninteichosaRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo" AS DbT5207Nintei WHERE DbT5207Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo") WHERE DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" IN #{code} order by DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo."remban"

result.column: 認定調査票調査_調査項目

mapper.select: SELECT DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem."remban" AS 認定調査票調査_連番 ,DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem."researchItem" AS 認定調査票調査_調査項目 FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" AS DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho ON DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho."shinseishoKanriNo"=DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem" AS DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem ON DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem."shinseishoKanriNo"=DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" AND DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem."ninteichosaRirekiNo"=(SELECT MAX(DbT5211Nintei."ninteichosaRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem" AS DbT5211Nintei WHERE DbT5211Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho."shinseishoKanriNo") WHERE DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" IN #{code} order by DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem."remban"

result.column: 前回認定調査票調査_連番
前回認定調査票調査_調査項目

select.id: get前回認定調査票調査項目

mapper.select: SELECT Zen_DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem."remban" AS 前回認定調査票調査_連番 ,Zen_DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem."researchItem" AS 前回認定調査票調査_調査項目 FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho" AS DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho ON DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo"=DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem" AS Zen_DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem ON Zen_DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem."shinseishoKanriNo"=DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho."zenkaiShinseishoKanriNo" AND Zen_DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem."ninteichosaRirekiNo"=(SELECT MAX(Zen_DbT5211Nintei."ninteichosaRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem" AS Zen_DbT5211Nintei WHERE Zen_DbT5211Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho."zenkaiShinseishoKanriNo") WHERE DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" IN #{code} order by Zen_DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem."remban"

mapper.select: SELECT DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem."remban" AS 主治医意見書_連番 ,DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem."ikenItem" AS 主治医意見書_意見項目 FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" AS DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho ON DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho."shinseishoKanriNo"=DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem" AS DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem ON DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem."shinseishoKanriNo"=DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" AND DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo"= (SELECT MAX(DbT5304Shujii."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem" AS DbT5304Shujii WHERE DbT5304Shujii."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho."shinseishoKanriNo") WHERE DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" IN #{code} order by DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem."remban"

result.column: 前回主治医意見書_連番

mapper.select: SELECT Zen_DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem."remban" AS 前回主治医意見書_連番 ,Zen_DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem."ikenItem" AS 前回主治医意見書_意見項目 FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho" AS DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho ON DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo"=DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem" AS Zen_DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem ON Zen_DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem."shinseishoKanriNo"=DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho."zenkaiShinseishoKanriNo" AND Zen_DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo"= (SELECT MAX(Zen_DbT5304Shujii."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem" AS Zen_DbT5304Shujii WHERE Zen_DbT5304Shujii."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho."zenkaiShinseishoKanriNo") WHERE DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" IN #{code} order by Zen_DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem."remban"

認定調査票フラグ_サービスの状況

mapper.select: SELECT DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag."remban" AS 認定調査票フラグ_連番 ,DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag."serviceJokyoFlag" AS 認定調査票フラグ_サービスの状況 FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag" AS DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag ON DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag."shinseishoKanriNo"=DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" AND DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag."ninteichosaRirekiNo"=(SELECT MAX(DbT5208Nintei."ninteichosaRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag" AS DbT5208Nintei WHERE DbT5208Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo") WHERE DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" IN #{code} order by DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag."remban"

result.column: 認定調査票記入_サービス状況記入

mapper.select: SELECT DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem."remban" AS 認定調査票記入_連番 ,DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem."serviceJokyoKinyu" AS 認定調査票記入_サービス状況記入 FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem" AS DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem ON DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem."shinseishoKanriNo"=DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" AND DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem."ninteichosaRirekiNo"=(SELECT MAX(DbT5209Nintei."ninteichosaRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem" AS DbT5209Nintei WHERE DbT5209Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo") WHERE DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."shinseishoKanriNo" IN #{code} order by DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem."remban"

result.column: 認定調査特記事項番号

select.id: get認定調査特記事項番号

mapper.select: SELECT DbT5205NinteichosahyoTokkijiko."shinseishoKanriNo" AS 申請書管理番号, DbT5205NinteichosahyoTokkijiko."ninteichosaTokkijikoNo" AS 認定調査特記事項番号 FROM rgdb."DbT5205NinteichosahyoTokkijiko" AS DbT5205NinteichosahyoTokkijiko WHERE DbT5205NinteichosahyoTokkijiko."shinseishoKanriNo" IN #{code} AND DbT5205NinteichosahyoTokkijiko."ninteichosaRirekiNo" = ( SELECT MAX(DbT5202."ninteichosaRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5202NinteichosahyoGaikyoChosa" AS DbT5202 WHERE DbT5202."shinseishoKanriNo" IN #{code} order by DbT5205NinteichosahyoTokkijiko."shinseishoKanriNo" ,DbT5205NinteichosahyoTokkijiko."ninteichosaTokkijikoNo")
